subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: Even without its injured superstar fly-half, Daniel Carter, New Zealand still should be able to win its quarterfinal at the Rugby World Cup, though it may have to scale back its playbook.
snippet: Even without its injured superstar fly-half, Daniel Carter, New Zealand still should be able to win its quarterfinal at the Rugby World Cup, though it may have to scale back its playbook.
